diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (ICD) placement for primary prevention of sudden cardiac death due to history of myocardial infarction and low left ventricular ejection fraction.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Mr. M has a history of myocardial infarction, resulting in cardiomyopathy and a low left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) of 25%. He exhibits mild congestive heart failure symptoms and is considering ICD placement to reduce the risk of sudden arrhythmic death. Current guidelines classify him as having a class I indication for ICD placement due to his condition.
